description: Main Features: Large Tube Mount Capture your entire adventure with this large tube mount that secures your VIRB™ or VIRB™ Elite to your bike or other large tube sporting equipment. Secure your device in the mount using the inserts. The mount can be used on large tubes from 0.75 inches to 1.5 inches, including handlebars, seat posts, roll bars, shotgun barrels and more. Interlocking joints that grip in place instead of relying solely on tension provide a durable, anti-vibration performance
productname: GARMIN BIKE MOUNT LARGE TUBE MOUNT FOR VIRB 010-11921-07
